entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas early this morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15 except minus 8 along parts of the coast. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 15 except minus 8 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Snow beginning late in the afternoon.
